name: Chonghua Frost Field
description:
Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Physical DMG is converted to Cryo DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' $[K100] is converted to $[K151].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
